move_details.name: clangorous-soulblaze
move_details.effect_description: Inflicts sound-based damage to all opposing Pokémon and increases the user’s Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each. The user’s stats are not raised if the move fails to damage any opposing Pokémon.
move_details.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This move boosts the user’s stats.
